entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Payment Channels in a CTV+Sapio World
entry.summary: In a recent post, Jeremy Rubin has shared a basic version of payment channels built on top of CTV/Sapio and the implications of having non-interactive channel creation. The post, available on rubin.io, delves into the concept of making channel opening more efficient, especially when paired with the payment pool idea. This development could prove to be a significant advancement for payment channels, and Jeremy seems to be optimistic about its future prospects.
